<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/identity-providers/{id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Update the details of an existing identity provider.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
>
  <Translate id="theme.openapi.request.title">Request</Translate>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"id","in":"path","description":"Identity provider ID","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Updated identity provider data","required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["name","type"],"properties":{"name":{"type":"string","description":"Name of the identity provider","example":"Google"},"description":{"type":"string","description":"Description of the identity provider","example":"Google OIDC identity provider for employee authentication"},"type":{"type":"string","description":"Type of the identity provider (e.g., OAUTH)","example":"GOOGLE","enum":["OAUTH","OIDC","GOOGLE","GITHUB"]},"properties":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"type":"string","description":"Name of the property","example":"your-client-id"},"value":{"type":"string","description":"Value of the property","example":"your-client-id"},"is_secret":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the property is secret","example":false}},"title":"IDPProperty"},"description":"Properties of the identity provider","example":[{"name":"client_id","value":"your-client-id","is_secret":false},{"name":"client_secret","value":"your-client-secret","is_secret":true},{"name":"scope","value":"openid email profile","is_secret":false}]}},"title":"IDPRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
